Package LimakWebApp.Utils

Class AbstractServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • LimakWebApp.Utils.Controller
      • LimakWebApp.Utils.AbstractServerController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainPageController, TestServerController

    public abstract class AbstractServerController
extends Controller

    AbstractServerController

    This class contains basic methods, constants for deriving AbstractServerControllers

    01.09.2019

    1.0
